rewardItem.name: Empty Disc
rewardItem.description: An empty disc used to teach your Pokémon a full new move set. Use it with caution.

missions.name: Participate in public battles using a water type

rewardItem.name: Net Ball
rewardItem.description: A somewhat different Poké Ball that is more effective when attempting to catch Water- or Bug-type Pokémon.

rewardItem.name: Present
rewardItem.description: Enter a chat and type !pokegift to make other players happy! 🎅

rewardPokemon.name: Sobble
rewardPokemon.description: When it gets wet, its skin changes color, and this Pokémon becomes invisible as if it were camouflaged.

rewardItem.name: Steel Stone
rewardItem.description: A stone that makes certain species of Pokémon evolve. It is said that the stone's color determines the Pokémon that will evolve.

rewardPokemon.name: Kyogre
rewardPokemon.description: Kyogre is said to be the personification of the sea itself. Legends tell of its many clashes against Groudon, as each sought to gain the power of nature.

rewardPokemon.name: Wartortle
rewardPokemon.description: It cleverly controls its furry ears and tail to maintain its balance while swimming.

missions.name: Catch a fish 100% bigger than average!
Catch a fish 25% smaller and 25% lighter!

rewardItem.name: Shimmering Stone
rewardItem.description: A stone that makes certain species of Pokémon evolve.

rewardItem.name: TM Bubble Beam
rewardItem.description: Teaches a water type Pokémon the move Bubble Beam. Randomly replaces one of the pokemon's water moves.

missions.name: Catch a fish 75% smaller than average!

rewardPokemon.name: Frogadier
rewardPokemon.description: Its swiftness is unparalleled. It can scale a tower of more than 2,000 feet in a minute’s time.

rewardItem.name: Dive Ball
rewardItem.description: A Ball that is more effective when attempting to catch🐟 Fish 🐟Pokémon.

rewardItem.name: Great Cherish Ball
rewardItem.description: A modified Cherish Ball with a better catch rate. Has a higher chance to catch a shiny Pokemon.

missions.name: Catch a fish 50% bigger than average!

rewardPokemon.name: Totodile
rewardPokemon.description: Despite the smallness of its body, Totodile’s jaws are very powerful. While the Pokémon may think it is just playfully nipping, its bite has enough power to cause serious injury.

missions.name: Catch a fish 100% heavier than average!
Catch a fish 75% lighter than average!

rewardPokemon.name: Manaphy
rewardPokemon.description: It starts its life with a wondrous power that permits it to bond with any kind of Pokémon.

missions.name: Catch a fish 50% heavier than average!

rewardPokemon.name: Slowbro
rewardPokemon.description: If this Pokémon squeezes the tongue of the Shellder biting it, the Shellder will launch a toxic liquid from the tip of its shell.

rewardItem.name: Dive Ball
rewardItem.description: A Ball that is more effective when attempting to catch🐟 Fish 🐟Pokémon.
